scripts.test:int:synth: npm run assert-aws-cdk && NODE_ENV=test cdk synth -a 'vite-node bin/app-test.ts' --no-staging --quiet
scripts.test:int:api:stop: kill $(ps wwo pid,args | grep -m 1 'sam local start-api' | awk '{print $1}'); docker network inspect sam-api-network | jq -r '.[].Containers[].Name | select(test("^(?!mongo|dynamo)"))' | xargs docker rm -f
scripts.test:int:prepare: npm run test:int:synth && npm run test:int:api:start-detached && wait-port 127.0.0.1:3000 -t 15000
scripts.test:int: npm run assert-aws-cdk && (npm run test:int:prepare && npm run test:int:run; npm run test:int:cleanup)
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && (npm run assert-aws-cdk 2> /dev/null && npm run test:int || echo 'Skipped integration tests')
scripts.lint: npm run type-check && npm run eslint
